items.question: Which platforms are supported and how does the processing work?
items.answer: We support video and subtitle extraction from YouTube and TikTok. The process is split into two stages: first, we extract the metadata and original subtitles; second, you can choose to use Gemini 1.5 Flash AI to translate the content into your target language.

items.question: How does the credit system and "Fail-Safe" refund policy work?
items.answer: Tasks consume credits based on usage: 10 for extraction, 15 for video downloads, and 5 for AI translation. If a task fails due to a system error, the credits are automatically refunded to your account immediately.

items.question: What is the difference between Subscription and On-demand plans?
items.answer: Subscription (Pro/Base): Best for power users, offering the lowest price per credit, high concurrency (up to 3 tasks), and no video length limits. Credits expire every 30 days. On-demand ($4.9): Perfect for casual users. These credits remain valid for 365 days.

items.question: Are there any limitations on video length or concurrent tasks?
items.answer: Free and Base users are limited to videos under 10 minutes and can process 1 task at a time. Professional users enjoy unlimited video length and can run up to 3 tasks simultaneously for maximum efficiency.

items.question: How can I earn free credits daily?
items.answer: You can earn 5 free credits every day by simply logging in and using our Daily Check-in feature. These credits are valid for 30 days and refresh at 00:00 UTC, allowing you to use our premium services for free over time.

items.question: How long is my data stored and is it secure?
items.answer: Your privacy is our priority. Extracted video files are stored in encrypted Cloudflare R2 storage and are permanently deleted after 24 hours. We recommend downloading your files (SRT, CSV, or Video) within this window.
